resources.string: There is no last positon. We need time to get one...
You are %s km from the next Saarbahn station (%s) away.
The selected station %s is %s km away.
With an active location service you get help more exactly. Please activate it.
mySaarBahn will download and install the roadmap to your phone. This can make a while. Please be patient.
No Data installed. Starting download and installation.

This software needs roadmap / actual data. It will try to download an install it into internal database. To do this, you need an internet connection. Please click on "Install" to start downloads and install data. This can make a very long time (up to 1 min.). Do not close this app untill all data was installed!

This software needs actual data. It will try to download and update the internal database. To do this, you need an internet connection. Please click on "Install" to start update. This can make a very long time (up to 1 min.). Do not close this app untill all data was installed!
Cklick here to see exact departure times on Saarbahn homepage.
